rooms.description: Serves as the main entry and transitional space; designed for natural light with large windows. Vastu aligned entrance.
Spacious living area with abundant natural light from multiple openings, promoting family interactions. Vastu guidelines suggest positioning on the south-west or east side.
Modern kitchen space with ventilation and adequate windows for natural lighting; located near dining area following local norms.
Connected to the living room; designed for social interactions with open design principles.
Private space dedicated to work, ideally placed in a quiet area, possibly near the north-east corner per Vastu recommendations.
Separate living area for domestic staff; includes a small kitchenette and personal space, adhering to local building codes.
